summary: A deranged rural farmer becomes a grave robber and murderer after the death of his possessive mother, whose corpse he keeps, among others, as his companion in a decaying farmhouse.
cast: Roberts Blossom|Cosette Lee|Leslie Carlson|Robert Warner|Marcia Diamond|Arlene Gillen|Robert McHeady|Marian Waldman|Jack Mather|Micki Moore|Pat Orr|Brian Smegal
title: Trastornado: Deranged
